metadata.Title: CVE-2013-7402 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: Multiple unspecified vulnerabilities in request.c in c-icap 0.2.x allow remote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) via a crafted ICAP request.

criterions.comment: c-icap: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
